title: A Smattering of spots
brief_description: Why some people enjoy television commercials. Imaginative use of the art of animated drawings and musical scoring make these fourteen “spots” immensely amusing. Includes five award winners. Written, designed and scored by A. Babbit, De. Elliott, T. Farlow, S. Freburg, A. Gillespie, R. Guidi, B. Hawinks, J. Hubley, W. Littlejohn, D. Ellington.
